Steel Industry.name: Squeeze Rolls
Steel Industry.description: These rolls are essential for removing excess liquid from metal surfaces during galvanizing or rolling processes, ensuring smooth finishes.

Steel Industry.name: Snubber Rolls
Steel Industry.description: They support and guide steel strips during processing, preventing misalignment and ensuring smooth operations.

Steel Industry.name: Pinch Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Pinch rolls are designed to pinch and feed metal sheets or strips through the production line with precision.

Steel Industry.name: Steering Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Pinch rolls are designed to pinch and feed metal sheets or strips through the production line with precision.

Steel Industry.name: Bridle Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Bridle rolls maintain consistent tension in steel strips as they move through the production process.

Steel Industry.name: Idler Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Provides support to steel strips and helps maintain alignment.

Steel Industry.name: Deflector Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Deflector rolls are used to guide steel strips at specific angles during production, optimizing flow.

Steel Industry.name: Dryer Rolls
Steel Industry.description: Dryer rolls are responsible for drying the surface of steel sheets after coating or cleaning to ensure proper finishing.

Steel Industry.name: Oiler Rolls
Steel Industry.description: These rolls apply a thin layer of oil to steel sheets to prevent rusting, protecting the material from environmental damage.

Steel Industry.name: Vertical Accumulator Rolls (Exit)
Steel Industry.description: Helps accumulate steel strips vertically for efficient storage or processing.These rolls help accumulate steel strips vertically for efficient storage or further processing.

Paper Industry.name: Top Press Rolls with Micro-rock covering
Paper Industry.description: Provides uniform pressure during the paper pressing process to ensure consistent sheet thickness.

Paper Industry.name: Pickup Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Transfers wet paper sheets from the forming section to the press section in paper manufacturing.

Paper Industry.name: Wire Couch Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Supports and removes excess water from the wire in paper machines, improving paper quality.

Paper Industry.name: Dryer Felt Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Carries paper sheets through the drying process, ensuring a uniform drying effect across the paper.

Paper Industry.name: Bottom Press Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Works alongside top press rolls to apply pressure and remove water, helping achieve the desired paper consistency.

Paper Industry.name: Mould Couch Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Used in the forming section to support and shape the paper as it is being created.

Paper Industry.name: Mount Hope Rolls
Paper Industry.description: These rolls maintain stability and proper alignment of paper during the manufacturing process.

Paper Industry.name: Wire Return Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Guide and redirect the wire in paper machines for continuous and smooth operation.

Paper Industry.name: M.G. Touch Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Imparts a smooth, glossy finish to paper sheets, enhancing their appearance and texture.

Paper Industry.name: Press Felt Rolls
Paper Industry.description: Supports the felts that carry the paper through the press section for proper water removal.

Paper Industry.name: Warm Rolls
Paper Industry.description: These rolls heat and smooth the paper sheets during the drying process, helping maintain the paper's integrity.

Textile Industry.name: Jigger Rolls
Textile Industry.description: Used in dyeing machines to wind and unwind textile fabric, ensuring smooth and consistent dyeing.

Textile Industry.name: Printing Rolls
Textile Industry.description: Applies color or patterns to textile fabrics during printing, creating vibrant designs and textures.

Textile Industry.name: Mangle Rolls
Textile Industry.description: Removes excess liquid and provides smoothness to textiles after processing, ensuring fabric quality.

Textile Industry.name: Guide Rolls
Textile Industry.description: Directs and aligns fabrics during various textile manufacturing steps to ensure precision and consistency.

Textile Industry.name: Stenter Rolls
Textile Industry.description: These rolls are used in stenter machines to stretch and hold fabrics during heat-setting, improving fabric strength and texture.

Roofing Industry.name: Custom Coverings for Roll Applications
Roofing Industry.description: Designed for durability and resistance against abrasion, ensuring effective performance in roofing material production.

Printing Industry.name: Offset Ink Forme Roller
Printing Industry.description: Ensures an even ink application on printing plates in offset printing machines, enabling high-quality prints.

Printing Industry.name: Offset Ink Duct Roller
Printing Industry.description: Transfers ink from the ink duct to the forme rollers in offset printing, ensuring smooth ink distribution.

Printing Industry.name: Flexo Roller
Printing Industry.description: Used in flexographic printing to apply ink to substrates, offering flexibility and precision for varied printing jobs.

Printing Industry.name: Lamination Roller
Printing Industry.description: Ensures uniform pressure during lamination, applying consistent layers for smooth finishes.

Printing Industry.name: Offset Ink Distributor Roller
Printing Industry.description: Distributes ink evenly across the forme rollers, ensuring consistent color and quality in offset printing.

Printing Industry.name: Offset Damping Roller
Printing Industry.description: Applies a dampening solution to the printing plate to maintain ink-water balance in offset presses.

Printing Industry.name: Photo Gravure Roller
Printing Industry.description: Engraved roller used in gravure printing to transfer ink to the substrate, ideal for high-quality printing applications.

Printing Industry.name: Varnishing Roller
Printing Industry.description: Applies varnish to printed materials to achieve a glossy or matte finish, enhancing the appearance of printed materials.

Conveyor Pulleys.name: Rubber and FRP Conveyor Pulleys
Conveyor Pulleys.description: Designed for efficient material handling with durability and high resistance to wear, these pulleys are essential for various industrial operations.

FRP Products.name: Pipes and Fittings
FRP Products.description: Lightweight, corrosion-resistant pipes and fittings designed for industrial piping systems, offering durability and long-term performance.

FRP Products.name: Tanks and Vessels
FRP Products.description: Custom-designed FRP tanks and vessels, perfect for handling high-temperature and corrosive materials in industrial applications.

FRP Products.name: Scrubbers and Stacks
FRP Products.description: These products are highly efficient in managing industrial emissions, offering long-lasting corrosion resistance.

Sand Blasting.name: Sand Blasting
Sand Blasting.description: Specializing in precision sandblasting, we provide top-notch surface finishing for all industries, enhancing the quality and durability of materials.
